description:
Ori and the Will of the Wisps is a 2D Metroidvania;
The sequel to Ori and the blind forest, a platform game emphasizing exploration, collecting items and upgrades, and
backtracking to previously inaccessible areas.
The player controls the titular Ori, a white guardian spirit.
game: Ori and the Will of the Wisps

v0.0.2.description:
Use the AP World that is downloaded separatly instead of the one in `AP_wotw_v002.zip`.

The new AP World fixes:
- Hammer, Shuriken, Spear, Blaze, Water Breath and Sentry not being given to the player
- No Rain having no effect

v0.1.1.description:
Only the AP world and the templates are changed, so you can only download them if you already have the client from `v0.1.0`.

- Add sub-options for `no_combat`, and documentation for the website. Huge thanks to @nicopop for implementing these two changes !
- You can now take multiple goals

Bug fixes:
- Spawn items were not renamed, which caused generation failures (Health fragment, Energy fragment and Clean Water were renamed in the last update)
- Tuley is now always there if QOL is enabled
- Games using `no_trials` should now be able to generate
v0.1.1.title: v0.1.1-alpha

v0.2.0.description:
Please wait a bit for the next version before updating the client if you don't want to be spammed by messages.

Changes:
- Add icons and desciptions to shop items (Implemented by @nicopop)
- New options: Launch on Seir, Knowledge hints, and added the possibility to remove only hand to hand from the quests
- Parse and display PrintJSON messages (sending an item, goal completed, player joining…)
- Add messages for connection issues
- Renamed Ore to Gorlek Ore
- Add commits from the standalone, including changes to controller input.

Fixes:
- Energy weapons (such as Flash or Bow) were missing in some paths
- Maybe fix a crash when receiving a resource item
- Fix a crash when receiving multiple items in one packet when it is not a sync packet
- Fix some generation issues (Work in progress, generation still fails often)
v0.2.0.title: v0.2.0-alpha

v0.2.1.description:
This is an update to the AP World and the client, please reinstall both.
- Fix the logic filter.
- Only display messages that concern you.
- Fix the unkown item name.
- Add more comments to the templates.
v0.2.1.title: v0.2.1-alpha

v0.3.0.description:
The game now uses slot_data instead of a file, so **the setup has changed**. The client is now included in the launcher releases, so make sure to update to the latest **Beta** version of the randomizer.

Huge thanks to Zre (@timoschwarzer) for the help and for implementing most of these changes !

This also fixes some issues with the client:
- The game no longer crashes when receiving a message
- The port can be changed without starting a new game file
- You no longer get duplicate items when starting the game
- The checked locations are automatically collected if it was not the case
v0.3.0.title: v0.3.0-alpha

v0.3.1.description:
Make sure to update the client to at least `4.30.0-beta.4` to play games generated from this AP World.

- Fix No trials causing the connection to fail.
- Fix Better random spawn.
v0.3.1.title: v0.3.1-alpha

v0.3.2.description:
- Add new shop icons made by Zre (@timoschwarzer)
- Fix better Wellspring
- Fix jumpgrades and skill velocity
- Fix bonus items (e.g. health regen) not being stackable
- Fix item names when IDs from two different games overlap
v0.3.2.title: v0.3.2-alpha

v0.3.3.description:
- Add a `random` option for goal to choose at random one of the other selected goals.
- Fix Rapid Sword, Rapid Hammer and Rapid Spear being way too fast and not working with the rando wheel.
- Put nothing on `GladesTown.FamilyReunionKey` as the location is currently unreachable.
v0.3.3.title: v0.3.3-alpha

v0.3.4.description:
- Add the common option `start_inventory_from_pool`.
- Fix hints displaying unknown location.
- Fix some bonus items not working as intended (e.g. efficiency upgrades, splinter shurikens).
- Fix the icons in Lupo's shop.
- Fix `no_quests` instantly checking the rebuild/regrow glades locations, even without `glades_done`.
- Fix data package not updating if the game already existed in the saved file.
- Update the documentation for the `quests` option.
v0.3.4.title: v0.3.4-alpha

v0.4.0.description:
### Main changes
- Complete rewrite of the code and logic. This reduces generation time and failures (it's still a work in progress, don't be surprised if there are failures).
- Add death link (with a life system, to only trigger it every N deaths). This is set in the `death_link` option.
- Add the `relics` goal (put local items in known areas, that are required for the goal). The amount of relics can be set with `relic_count`
- Add the `door_rando` option.
- The client now tries to connect using the new connection info, if the ones saved in the file don't work (tldr: you don't have to make a new save if the port changes).

### Full changes
- Use compressed websockets.
- Check the AP World version in the client.
- Check the AP seed, to prevent you from loading a wrong save file.
- Don't display messages when someone join/leave the game if there are more than 5 players in the game.
- Added manifest file.
- Added aliases for items, and changed some classifications.
- Added location groups, and more item groups.
- Added `EastHollow.WellspringDoneTalk` location (talk to Kwolok after Wellspring escape).
- Fix `GladesTown.FamilyReunionKey` being uncheckable.
- Fix a bug where `random` in the goal option could give goals that were not selected.
- Fix some glitched paths in unsafe that did not appear in the rules.
- Fix a client crash if you loaded a seed from an old AP world, it now warns you that you are using an outdated AP World.

v0.4.0-pre.description:
Completely refactor the code base and the logic parser.
- Seed generation succeeds more often (this is still a work in progress)
- Generation is much faster
- Better code quality and readability
v0.4.0-pre.title: v0.4.0-prerelease

v0.4.1.description:
- Fix logic for `GladesTown.KeyMokiHutEX` and `WoodsEntry.DollQI`.
- Fix generation always failing when `glades_done` was True.
- Add location groups (for real this time).
- Properly add the `archipelago.json` manifest file.

v0.4.2.description: Fix the generation failures that were happening during playthough calculation. This was fixed by @Mysteryem, huge thanks to them !

v0.5.0.description:
### New features
- Added some AP actions to the randomizer wheel (hold **V** to open it). This includes a deathlink toggle, a way to reset the inventory (in case it got desynced), checking hints, and hinting items.
- Add the `zone_hints` option: Lupo maps indicate how many progression items are in the area.
- Add Launch Fragments (enabled with `launch_fragments`, and `fragments_required` / `fragments_count` to modify the amount of launch fragments to get Launch / the total amount.
- Item names are colored depending on their classification. **Blue**: progression + useful, **yellow**: progression, **green**: useful, **white**: filler, **r**: trap. For WotW, it uses the same colors as the base rando. 

### Other changes
- Display hints when the location is not in WotW (but it is one of your items).
- Remove `Nothing` items on empty locations, instead the unused locations don't exist.
- Fix in-game pickup counter.
- Locations are automatically collected when dying before a save.
- Add an option to enable paths with the Unpopular tag.
- Fix in-game logic filter when glitches are enabled.
- Deathlink lives can be increased to 99 instead of 10.
- Updated `areas.wotw`, to include new logic paths.
